00022 #include "socklnd.h"
00023 
00024 static int sock_timeout = 50;
00025 module_param(sock_timeout, int, 0644);
00026 MODULE_PARM_DESC(sock_timeout, "dead socket timeout (seconds)");
00027 
00028 static int credits = 256;
00029 module_param(credits, int, 0444);
00030 MODULE_PARM_DESC(credits, "# concurrent sends");
00031 
00032 static int peer_credits = 8;
00033 module_param(peer_credits, int, 0444);
00034 MODULE_PARM_DESC(peer_credits, "# concurrent sends to 1 peer");
00035 
00036 static int peer_buffer_credits;
00037 module_param(peer_buffer_credits, int, 0444);
00038 MODULE_PARM_DESC(peer_buffer_credits, "# per-peer router buffer credits");
00039 
00040 static int peer_timeout = 180;
00041 module_param(peer_timeout, int, 0444);
00042 MODULE_PARM_DESC(peer_timeout, "Seconds without aliveness news to declare peer dead (<=0 to disable)");
00043 
00044 /* Number of daemons in each thread pool which is percpt,
00045  * we will estimate reasonable value based on CPUs if it's not set. */
00046 static unsigned int nscheds;
00047 module_param(nscheds, int, 0444);
00048 MODULE_PARM_DESC(nscheds, "# scheduler daemons in each pool while starting");
00049 
00050 static int nconnds = 4;
00051 module_param(nconnds, int, 0444);
00052 MODULE_PARM_DESC(nconnds, "# connection daemons while starting");
00053 
00054 static int nconnds_max = 64;
00055 module_param(nconnds_max, int, 0444);
00056 MODULE_PARM_DESC(nconnds_max, "max # connection daemons");
00057 
00058 static int min_reconnectms = 1000;
00059 module_param(min_reconnectms, int, 0644);
00060 MODULE_PARM_DESC(min_reconnectms, "min connection retry interval (mS)");
00061 
00062 static int max_reconnectms = 60000;
00063 module_param(max_reconnectms, int, 0644);
00064 MODULE_PARM_DESC(max_reconnectms, "max connection retry interval (mS)");
00065 
00066 static int eager_ack;
00067 module_param(eager_ack, int, 0644);
00068 MODULE_PARM_DESC(eager_ack, "send tcp ack packets eagerly");
00069 
00070 static int typed_conns = 1;
00071 module_param(typed_conns, int, 0444);
00072 MODULE_PARM_DESC(typed_conns, "use different sockets for bulk");
00073 
00074 static int min_bulk = (1<<10);
00075 module_param(min_bulk, int, 0644);
00076 MODULE_PARM_DESC(min_bulk, "smallest 'large' message");
00077 
00078 # define DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE 0
00079 static int tx_buffer_size = DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE;
00080 module_param(tx_buffer_size, int, 0644);
00081 MODULE_PARM_DESC(tx_buffer_size, "socket tx buffer size (0 for system default)");
00082 
00083 static int rx_buffer_size = DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE;
00084 module_param(rx_buffer_size, int, 0644);
00085 MODULE_PARM_DESC(rx_buffer_size, "socket rx buffer size (0 for system default)");
00086 
00087 static int nagle = 0;
00088 module_param(nagle, int, 0644);
00089 MODULE_PARM_DESC(nagle, "enable NAGLE?");
00090 
00091 static int round_robin = 1;
00092 module_param(round_robin, int, 0644);
00093 MODULE_PARM_DESC(round_robin, "Round robin for multiple interfaces");
00094 
00095 static int keepalive = 30;
00096 module_param(keepalive, int, 0644);
00097 MODULE_PARM_DESC(keepalive, "# seconds before send keepalive");
00098 
00099 static int keepalive_idle = 30;
00100 module_param(keepalive_idle, int, 0644);
00101 MODULE_PARM_DESC(keepalive_idle, "# idle seconds before probe");
00102 
00103 #define DEFAULT_KEEPALIVE_COUNT  5
00104 static int keepalive_count = DEFAULT_KEEPALIVE_COUNT;
00105 module_param(keepalive_count, int, 0644);
00106 MODULE_PARM_DESC(keepalive_count, "# missed probes == dead");
00107 
00108 static int keepalive_intvl = 5;
00109 module_param(keepalive_intvl, int, 0644);
00110 MODULE_PARM_DESC(keepalive_intvl, "seconds between probes");
00111 
00112 static int enable_csum = 0;
00113 module_param(enable_csum, int, 0644);
00114 MODULE_PARM_DESC(enable_csum, "enable check sum");
00115 
00116 static int inject_csum_error = 0;
00117 module_param(inject_csum_error, int, 0644);
00118 MODULE_PARM_DESC(inject_csum_error, "set non-zero to inject a checksum error");
00119 
00120 #ifdef CPU_AFFINITY
00121 static int enable_irq_affinity = 0;
00122 module_param(enable_irq_affinity, int, 0644);
00123 MODULE_PARM_DESC(enable_irq_affinity, "enable IRQ affinity");
00124 #endif
00125 
00126 static int nonblk_zcack = 1;
00127 module_param(nonblk_zcack, int, 0644);
00128 MODULE_PARM_DESC(nonblk_zcack, "always send ZC-ACK on non-blocking connection");
00129 
00130 static unsigned int zc_min_payload = (16 << 10);
00131 module_param(zc_min_payload, int, 0644);
00132 MODULE_PARM_DESC(zc_min_payload, "minimum payload size to zero copy");
00133 
00134 static unsigned int zc_recv = 0;
00135 module_param(zc_recv, int, 0644);
00136 MODULE_PARM_DESC(zc_recv, "enable ZC recv for Chelsio driver");
00137 
00138 static unsigned int zc_recv_min_nfrags = 16;
00139 module_param(zc_recv_min_nfrags, int, 0644);
00140 MODULE_PARM_DESC(zc_recv_min_nfrags, "minimum # of fragments to enable ZC recv");
00141 
00142 #ifdef SOCKNAL_BACKOFF
00143 static int backoff_init = 3;
00144 module_param(backoff_init, int, 0644);
00145 MODULE_PARM_DESC(backoff_init, "seconds for initial tcp backoff");
00146 
00147 static int backoff_max = 3;
00148 module_param(backoff_max, int, 0644);
00149 MODULE_PARM_DESC(backoff_max, "seconds for maximum tcp backoff");
00150 #endif
00151 
00152 #if SOCKNAL_VERSION_DEBUG
00153 static int protocol = 3;
00154 module_param(protocol, int, 0644);
00155 MODULE_PARM_DESC(protocol, "protocol version");
00156 #endif
00157 
00158 ksock_tunables_t ksocknal_tunables;
00159 
00160 int ksocknal_tunables_init(void)
00161 {
00162 
00163         /* initialize ksocknal_tunables structure */
00164         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_timeout            = &sock_timeout;
00165         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_nscheds            = &nscheds;
00166         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_nconnds            = &nconnds;
00167         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_nconnds_max        = &nconnds_max;
00168         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_min_reconnectms    = &min_reconnectms;
00169         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_max_reconnectms    = &max_reconnectms;
00170         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_eager_ack          = &eager_ack;
00171         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_typed_conns        = &typed_conns;
00172         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_min_bulk           = &min_bulk;
00173         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_tx_buffer_size     = &tx_buffer_size;
00174         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_rx_buffer_size     = &rx_buffer_size;
00175         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_nagle              = &nagle;
00176         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_round_robin        = &round_robin;
00177         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_keepalive          = &keepalive;
00178         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_keepalive_idle     = &keepalive_idle;
00179         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_keepalive_count    = &keepalive_count;
00180         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_keepalive_intvl    = &keepalive_intvl;
00181         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_credits            = &credits;
00182         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_peertxcredits      = &peer_credits;
00183         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_peerrtrcredits     = &peer_buffer_credits;
00184         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_peertimeout        = &peer_timeout;
00185         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_enable_csum        = &enable_csum;
00186         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_inject_csum_error  = &inject_csum_error;
00187         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_nonblk_zcack       = &nonblk_zcack;
00188         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_zc_min_payload     = &zc_min_payload;
00189         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_zc_recv            = &zc_recv;
00190         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_zc_recv_min_nfrags = &zc_recv_min_nfrags;
00191 
00192 #ifdef CPU_AFFINITY
00193         if (enable_irq_affinity) {
00194                 CWARN("irq_affinity is removed from socklnd because modern "
00195                       "computer always has fast CPUs and more cores than "
00196                       "# NICs, although you still can set irq_affinity by "
00197                       "another way, please check manual for details.\n");
00198         }
00199         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_irq_affinity       = &enable_irq_affinity;
00200 #endif
00201 
00202 #ifdef SOCKNAL_BACKOFF
00203         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_backoff_init       = &backoff_init;
00204         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_backoff_max        = &backoff_max;
00205 #endif
00206 
00207 #if SOCKNAL_VERSION_DEBUG
00208         ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_protocol           = &protocol;
00209 #endif
00210 
00211         if (*ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_zc_min_payload < (2 << 10))
00212                 *ksocknal_tunables.ksnd_zc_min_payload = (2 << 10);
00213 
00214         return 0;
00215 };
